-2-
i GUESS I AM HAVING REAL DIFFICULTY IN IMAGINING
WHAT SORT OF A DISCUSSION COULD TAKE PLACE IN CHICAGO
this Fall* I am certain we would have old-timers like
YOURSELF WHO WERE PRETTY WELL FILLEO ON HOW NAEB GOT
where it is* Similarly we undoubtedly would have some
PEOPLE WHO WERE ATTENDING THEIR VERY FIRST NAEB MEETING,
Whether we could show so organized a threephour discussion
THAT WOULD BE HELPFUL TO BOTH GROUPS OR NOT IS TO MY MIND
A REAL QUESTION.
However, you know the general rule of NAEB, We
ALWAYS LIKE TO TRY. THEREFORE IF YOU THINK THESE
DIFFERENCES CAN BE RECTIFIED ANO IF YOU THINK THAT WE
CAN MAKE SOME REAL PROGRESS IN THIS SORT OF OISCUSSION
I FOR ONE WOULD BE PERFECTLY WILLING TO COME TO CHICAGO
ON ANY DATE YOU 8UGGEST.
As A POSSIBLE TEMPORARY ALTERNATE, I WONDER IF
IT WOULD BE WISE IF YOU ANO I WERE TO SIT DOWN AND TRY
TO AT LEAST DETERMINE THE LEVEL OF UNDERSTANDING OF
THOSE WHO WOULD 8E APT TO ATTEND AND LIST WH#T QUESTIONS
SHOULD BE ANSWERED ANO WHAT BACKGROUND GIVEN.
Although I’ve been away extensively this summer
I AM CERTAIN THAT I WOULO WELCOME THE OPPORTUNITY FOR A
oay’s junket Chicago way. Therefore, why not let me
KNOW WHAT YOUR SCHEDULE FOR THE MONTH OF AUGUST IS AND
LET ME SEE IF I CAN’T DOVETAIL THAT WITH MY RATHER
COMPLICATED SCHEDULE HERE.
In REVIEWING THIS LETTER l RECOGNIZE THAT I HAVE
PERHAPS OVERCOMPLICATED THE SITUATION. MAYBE THIS IS
BECAUSE I AM SO CLOSE TO THE WOODS THAT I CAN*T SEE THE
INDIVIDUAL TREES. I THINK, HOWEVER, THAT YOU KNOW ME
WELL ENOUGH TO SAY THAT I HAVE BEEN VERBOSE, IF THIS IS
THE CASE. Drop ME a LINE AT YOUR CONVENIENCE AND LET*S
talk.
Sincerely,
James S, Miles
Director Raoio-TV
